question: Department Of Defence Production signs a MoU with the company to target the Revenue from Operations.
explanation: Goa Shipyard Limited (GSL) & a miniratna Defence Public Sector Undertaking (DPSU) signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) for the financial year 2017-18. Thus the MoU target for 'Revenue from Operations' has been set at Rs 1,150 crore, which is 43% higher than the financial year 2016-17 target of Rs 800 crore.
